pages.text: $(thing)Upgrades/$ improve an $(l:intro/item_router)Item Router's/$ functionality in various ways.  There are 8 different upgrade types, and 5 upgrade slots in an Item Router.$(p)You can put multiple upgrades in an upgrade slot, although there is a limit on how many upgrades of a particular type can be inserted; see the individual upgrade pages or upgrade item tooltips for more information on this.
